name: 高級教育統計學（甲）
comment: 大學部3年級/4年級可上修,需有先修統計課程.
goals: 1.	了解常用統計檢定方法的原理及其適用時機
2.	選擇適切的分析方法解決問題和解釋分析結果
3.	運用統計軟體執行資料分析並撰寫分析結果報告
syllabus:

Course Title:

**Advanced Educational Statistics (A)**

*   **Course Aims**

*   To introduce the concepts of statistics in regression models.
*   To develop students’ understanding of advanced statistics and applications.

*   **Teaching and Learning Activities (TLAs)**

Concepts, knowledge, and relevant examples are provided and explained

*   Class discussion

Questions are given in/after class

*   Computer Software Practice

Demonstration and hand-on experience of using statistical software to analyze datasets are provided. Explanation and interpretation on the results are instructed.

*   **Reading List**

**Compulsory Readings**

Kutner, M. H., Nachtsheim, C. J., Neter, J., & Li, W. (2005). _Applied Linear Statistical Models_ (5 ed.): McGraw-Hill Irwin Boston.

Wang, J., & Wang, X. (2019). _Structural equation modeling: Applications using Mplus_. John Wiley & Sons.

**Additional Readings**

Larsen, R. J., & Marx, M. L. (2018). _Introduction to Mathematical Statistics and Its Applications: Pearson New International Edition_ (6 ed.): Pearson Higher Ed.

**_Note_:**

*   **No late homework will be accepted for credit.**
*   **If a student misses any one of the exams because of documented illness or emergency, he/she will have a chance to take a make-up examination. Otherwise, he/she will be given a mark of zero. The of the make-up examination will be multiplied by 80% as a final mark.**
*   **Reading homework: he/she must submit effective homework, otherwise 10 points down for no submission.**
